    • Constructor Detail

      • MyJobScheduler

        public MyJobScheduler(java.lang.String quartzConfAbsPath)
        By default, StdSchedulerFactory loads a properties file named "quartz.properties" from the 'current working directory'. If that fails, then the "quartz.properties" file located (as a resource) in the org/quartz package is loaded.

        We will provide our own configuration.
        Parameters:
        quartzConfAbsPath -

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
           throws org.quartz.SchedulerException
        Start the scheduler. No jobs will be defined after this call.
        Throws:
        org.quartz.SchedulerException

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
              throws org.quartz.SchedulerException
        Shuts down the scheduler. All defined jobs are lost.
        Throws:
        org.quartz.SchedulerException
